articles.title: India's Trade Pact With 4-Nation European Bloc: All About Swiss Watches, Chocolates Set to Enter Indian Mar - News18
articles.description: India and the EFTA bloc signed a trade pact, offering access to Swiss goods. TEPA heralds new opportunities for trade and investment
articles.content: India and the four-European nation bloc EFTA signed a trade and economic partnership agreement (TEPA) on Sunday to enhance trade and investments between the two regions, heralding a new era of econom… [+6598 chars]

articles.author: Greg Wehner
articles.title: Apple reverses course, allows Epic Games to launch Fortnite app in EU - Fox Business
articles.description: Apple changed its decision from last week to block Epic Games from opening its own online marketplace for iPhones and iPads on Friday, allowing for the store to open in Europe.
articles.content:
Apple reversed its decision to block Fortnite video game developer Epic Games from launching its own online marketplace for iPhones and iPads in Europe on Friday and has now cleared the way.
